name: latitude
notes: The latitude of the site in the range (-90, 90).

name: longitude
notes: The longitude of the site in the range (-180, 180).

name: leap year
notes: The leap year parameter. If true will return leap day data if present.

name: utc
notes: Universal time code. True will use UTC, false will use local time zone of data.

name: mailing list
notes: Do you want to sign up for their mailing list?
